Params: {1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'This should be the assembly department of the factory.', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'The Corrupted are assembled here one by one, then sent through the elevators onto the surface, terrorizing the Earth...', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Moving on his own in this situation...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "We can't leave Kamui behind like this, can we?", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'Please decide quickly. Some of the Corrupted on the production line have awakened.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'If they all activate at the same time...', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: "That's why I'm telling you to hurry, wait... The back as well...", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: 'Corrupted are filling in the path we took... Almost an endless horde...', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: "Hey hey hey! Nanami hasn't voiced her opinion yet!", 4: '1'}
